description: The traveler is Meray`s and Baraz`s great-grandfather. 100 years ago, Hoopa destroyed the town which would become DÃ©sser City. The traveler stopped the rampaging Hoopa Unbound in the Prison Bottle. Arceus would communicate with the traveler and he was gifted with powers. He took Hoopa to live in the traveler and placed the Prison Bottle in a far off area and hid it until a time when Hoopa could understand the meaning of its confinement and be able to pass through its rings.
name: Tabibito
